trans-unit.source: netcredentials_only: The process will use the same token as the caller but will use the become_user and become_password when accessing a remote resource. This is useful in inter-domain scenarios where there is no trust relationship, and should be used with the new_credentialslogon_type.
trans-unit.target: netcredentials_only ：该过程将使用与调用方相同的令牌，但在访问远程资源时将使用 become_user 和 become_password 。这在没有信任关系的域间方案中很有用，应与 new_credentials logon_type 一起使用。

trans-unit.source: netmask - Subnet mask in case of static boot protocol is used.
trans-unit.target: netmask -使用静态启动协议时的子网掩码。

trans-unit.source: network: Runs the process under a network context without any cached credentials. This results in the same type of logon session as running a normal WinRM process without credential delegation, and operates under the same restrictions.
trans-unit.target: network ：在没有任何缓存凭据的网络上下文下运行进程。这导致与运行常规WinRM进程而没有凭据委派的登录会话类型相同，并且在相同的限制下运行。

trans-unit.source: network_cleartext: Like the network logon type, but instead caches the credentials so it can access network resources. This is the same type of logon session as running a normal WinRM process with credential delegation.
trans-unit.target: network_cleartext ：与 network 登录类型类似，但是会缓存凭据，以便它可以访问网络资源。这与运行具有凭据委派的普通WinRM进程的登录会话类型相同。

trans-unit.source: network_os: myos
trans-unit.target: network_os ：myos

trans-unit.source: never - Nothing is filtered, always obey metadata_expire.
trans-unit.target: never -不进行任何过滤，始终遵循metadata_expire。

trans-unit.source: never disables any encryption checks that are in place when running over HTTP and disables any authentication encryption processes.
trans-unit.target: never 禁用通过HTTP运行时进行的任何加密检查，也不会禁用任何身份验证加密过程。

trans-unit.source: never will not request a certificate from the server so no validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: never 不会从服务器请求证书，因此不会进行验证。

trans-unit.source: new_credentials: Runs under the same credentials as the calling user, but outbound connections are run under the context of the become_user and become_password, similar to runas.exe /netonly. The logon_flags flag should also be set to netcredentials_only. Use this flag if the process needs to access a network resource (like an SMB share) using a different set of credentials.
trans-unit.target: new_credentials ：在与调用用户相同的凭据下运行，但是出站连接在 become_user 和 become_password 的上下文中运行，类似于 runas.exe /netonly 。该 logon_flags 标记也应被设置为 netcredentials_only 。如果进程需要使用一组不同的凭据访问网络资源（如SMB共享），请使用此标志。

trans-unit.source: nic_boot_protocol - Set boot protocol of the network interface of Virtual Machine. Can be one of none, dhcp or static.
trans-unit.target: nic_boot_protocol -设置虚拟机网络接口的启动协议。可以是 none ， dhcp 或 static 之一。

trans-unit.source: nic_gateway - If boot protocol is static, set this gateway to network interface of Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: nic_ip_address - If boot protocol is static, set this IP address to network interface of Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: nic_ip_address -如果引导协议是静态的，请将此IP地址设置为虚拟机的网络接口。

trans-unit.source: nic_name - Set name to network interface of Virtual Machine.

trans-unit.source: nic_netmask - If boot protocol is static, set this netmask to network interface of Virtual Machine.
trans-unit.target: nic_netmask -如果启动协议是静态的，请将此网络掩码设置为虚拟机的网络接口。

trans-unit.source: nic_on_boot - If True network interface will be set to start on boot.
trans-unit.target: nic_on_boot -如果将True网络接口设置为在引导时启动。

trans-unit.source: present - Asserts the existence of a container matching the name and any provided configuration parameters. If no container matches the name, a container will be created. If a container matches the name but the provided configuration does not match, the container will be updated, if it can be. If it cannot be updated, it will be removed and re-created with the requested config.
trans-unit.target: present -断言匹配名称的容器和任何提供的配置参数的存在。如果没有与名称匹配的容器，则将创建一个容器。如果容器与名称匹配，但提供的配置不匹配，则将对其进行更新（如果可以）。如果无法更新，它将被删除并使用请求的配置重新创建。

trans-unit.source: present - Asserts the existence of a service matching the name and provided configuration parameters. Unspecified configuration parameters will be set to docker defaults.
trans-unit.target: present -断言匹配的名称和提供的配置参数的服务的存在。未指定的配置参数将设置为docker默认值。

trans-unit.source: present creates the network, if it does not already exist with the specified parameters, and connects the list of containers provided via the connected parameter. Containers not on the list will be disconnected. An empty list will leave no containers connected to the network. Use the appends option to leave existing containers connected. Use the force options to force re-creation of the network.
trans-unit.target: present 如果使用指定的参数尚不存在，则present创建一个网络，并连接通过已连接参数提供的容器列表。不在列表中的容器将被断开连接。空列表将不保留任何容器连接到网络。使用appends选项使现有容器保持连接状态。使用强制选项来强制重新创建网络。

trans-unit.source: read-only:future - Commands that are likely to result in running other commands which will require the latest metadata. Eg. yum check-update.

trans-unit.source: read-only:past - Commands that only care about past information are filtered from metadata expiring. Eg. yum history info (if history needs to lookup anything about a previous transaction, then by definition the remote package was available in the past).
trans-unit.target: read-only:past past-仅关心过去信息的命令从元数据过期中过滤掉。例如。yum历史记录信息（如果历史记录需要查找有关先前事务的任何内容，那么根据定义，远程软件包在过去可用）。

trans-unit.source: read-only:present - Commands that are balanced between past and future. Eg. yum list yum.

trans-unit.source: refresh_inventory (added in Ansible 2.0) forces the reload of the inventory, which in the case of dynamic inventory scripts means they will be re-executed. If the dynamic inventory script is using a cache, Ansible cannot know this and has no way of refreshing it (you can disable the cache or, if available for your specific inventory datasource (e.g. aws), you can use the an inventory plugin instead of an inventory script). This is mainly useful when additional hosts are created and users wish to use them instead of using the add_host module.
trans-unit.target: refresh_inventory （在Ansible 2.0中添加了）会强制重新加载清单，这在动态清单脚本的情况下意味着它们将被重新执行。如果动态清单脚本正在使用缓存，则Ansible无法知道并且无法刷新它（您可以禁用缓存，或者，如果可用于特定清单数据源（例如aws），则可以使用清单插件代替广告资源脚本）。这在创建其他主机并且用户希望使用它们而不是使用add_host模块时非常有用。

trans-unit.source: started/stopped are idempotent actions that will not run commands unless necessary. restarted will always bounce the service (sv restart) and killed will always bounce the service (sv force-stop). reloaded will send a HUP (sv reload). once will run a normally downed sv once (sv once), not really an idempotent operation.
trans-unit.target: started / stopped 是幂等操作，除非必要，否则将不会运行命令。 restarted 将始终反弹服务（sv重新启动），而 killed 将始终反弹服务（sv强制停止）。 reloaded 将发送HUP（SV重新加载）。 once 将运行通常关闭的sv一次（sv一次），而不是真正的幂等操作。

trans-unit.source: started/stopped are idempotent actions that will not run commands unless necessary. restarted will always bounce the service. reloaded will always reload.

trans-unit.source: started/stopped are idempotent actions that will not run commands unless necessary. restarted will always bounce the service. reloaded will send a SIGHUP or start the service. reset will start or stop the service according to whether it is enabled or not.
trans-unit.target: started / stopped 是幂等操作，除非必要，否则将不会运行命令。 restarted 将始终弹跳服务。 reloaded 将发送SIGHUP或启动服务。 reset 将根据服务是否启用来启动或停止该服务。

trans-unit.source: started/stopped are idempotent actions that will not run commands unless necessary. Not all init scripts support restarted nor reloaded natively, so these will both trigger a stop and start as needed.
trans-unit.target: started / stopped 是幂等操作，除非必要，否则将不会运行命令。并非所有初始化脚本都支持本地 restarted 或 reloaded ，因此它们都会触发停止并根据需要启动。

From Ansible 2.6 on, it is no longer marked this way as it causes error messages to be come unusable, and data does not contain any information which can be used without having access to the account key or which are not public anyway.

trans-unit.source: Platform provider roles - Provider roles translate between the user roles and the various network OSs, each of which has a different API. Each provider role accepts input from a supported user role and translates it for a specific network OS. Network user roles depend on these provider roles to implement their functions. For example, the config_manager user role uses the cisco_ios provider role to implement tasks on Cisco IOS network devices.
trans-unit.target: 平台提供程序角色 -提供程序角色在用户角色和各种网络操作系统之间进行转换，每个角色都有不同的API。每个提供程序角色都接受来自受支持的用户角色的输入，并将其转换为特定的网络OS。网络用户角色依赖于这些提供程序角色来实现其功能。例如，config_manager用户角色使用cisco_ios提供者角色在Cisco IOS网络设备上实施任务。

trans-unit.source: A 6to4 tunnel is a way to access the IPv6 Internet from an IPv4-only network. If you have a public IPv4 address, you can automatically configure its IPv6 equivalent in the 2002::/16 network range. After conversion you will gain access to a 2002:xxxx:xxxx::/48 subnet which could be split into 65535 /64 subnets if needed.
trans-unit.target: 一的6to4隧道是从仅支持IPv4的网络接入到IPv6网络的方式。如果您具有公共IPv4地址，则可以在 2002::/16 网络范围内自动配置等效的IPv6 。转换完成后，你将获得一个 2002:xxxx:xxxx::/48 子网可能是分割成65535个 /64 个，如果需要的子网。

trans-unit.source: A best practice approach for this is to start with a group_vars/ subdirectory named after the group. Inside of this subdirectory, create two files named vars and vault. Inside of the vars file, define all of the variables needed, including any sensitive ones. Next, copy all of the sensitive variables over to the vault file and prefix these variables with vault_. You should adjust the variables in the vars file to point to the matching vault_ variables using jinja2 syntax, and ensure that the vault file is vault encrypted.
trans-unit.target: 最佳实践方法是从以该组命名的 group_vars/ 子目录开始。在此子目录中，创建两个名为 vars 和 vault 的文件。在 vars 文件中，定义所需的所有变量，包括任何敏感变量。接下来，将所有敏感变量复制到 vault 文件中，并在这些变量 vault_ 加上vault_。您应该使用jinja2语法调整 vars 文件中的变量，使其指向匹配的 vault_ 变量，并确保对 vault 文件进行了库加密。

trans-unit.source: A bug in Ansible v1 causes DOS-type text files (using a carriage return and newline) to be templated to Unix-type text files (using only a newline). In Ansible v2 this long-standing bug was finally fixed and DOS-type text files are preserved correctly. This may be confusing when you expect your playbook to not show any differences when migrating to Ansible v2, while in fact you will see every DOS-type file being completely replaced (with what appears to be the exact same content).
trans-unit.target: Ansible v1中的一个错误会导致DOS类型的文本文件(使用回车和换行)被模板化为Unix类型的文本文件(只使用换行)。在Ansible v2中,这个长期存在的错误终于得到了修复,DOS类型的文本文件得以正确保存。当你期望你的游戏本在迁移到Ansible v2时不会出现任何差异时,这可能会让你感到困惑,而事实上你会看到每个DOS类型的文件都被完全替换了(看起来内容完全相同)。

trans-unit.source: A bug was fixed with the inventory path/directory, which was defaulting to the current working directory. This caused group_vars and host_vars to be picked up from the current working directory instead of just adjacent to the playbook or inventory directory when a host list (comma separated host names) was provided as inventory.
trans-unit.target: 修复了目录路径/目录的错误，该目录/目录默认为当前工作目录。当提供主机列表（用逗号分隔的主机名）作为清单时，这会导致从当前工作目录中拾取 group_vars 和 host_vars ，而不仅仅是从剧本或清单目录中获取。

trans-unit.source: A client connection is considered lossy when percentage of times a packet could not be transmitted due to tcp zero window is above this threshold.

trans-unit.source: A cluster allows two switches to cooperate in high-availability (HA) deployments. The nodes that form the cluster must be members of the same fabric. Clusters are typically used in conjunction with a virtual link aggregation group (VLAG) that allows links physically connected to two separate switches appear as a single trunk to a third device. The third device can be a switch,server, or any Ethernet device.
trans-unit.target: 集群允许两台交换机在高可用性(HA)部署中进行合作。组成集群的节点必须是同一结构的成员。集群通常与虚拟链路聚合组(VLAG)一起使用,它允许物理上连接到两台独立交换机的链路显示为连接到第三台设备的单一主干。第三设备可以是交换机、服务器或任何以太网设备。

The order of the list is preserved across runs unless purge_cache_behavior is enabled. Each cache behavior comprises the attributes path_patterntarget_origin_idforwarded_valuesquery_stringcookiesforwardwhitelisted_namesheaders[]query_string_cache_keys[]trusted_signersenableditems[]viewer_protocol_policymin_ttlallowed_methodsitems[]cached_methods[]smooth_streamingdefault_ttlmax_ttlcompresslambda_function_associations[]field_level_encryption_id

trans-unit.source: A config element that is a list[] of complex custom error responses to be specified for the distribution. This attribute configures custom http error messages returned to the user. trans-unit.source: A config element that is a list[] of complex origin objects to be specified for the distribution. Used for creating and updating distributions. trans-unit.source: A config element that is a complex object specifying the default cache behavior of the distribution. trans-unit.source: A config element that specifies the path to request when the user requests the origin. e.g. if specified as 'index.html', this maps to www.example.com/index.html when www.example.com is called by the user. This prevents the entire distribution origin from being exposed at the root.

trans-unit.source: A dict of filters to apply when deciding whether existing instances match and should be altered. Each dict item consists of a filter key and a filter value. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeInstances.html. for possible filters. Filter names and values are case sensitive. By default, instances are filtered for counting by their "Name" tag, base AMI, state (running, by default), and subnet ID. Any queryable filter can be used. Good candidates are specific tags, SSH keys, or security groups.
trans-unit.target: 确定现有实例是否匹配并应更改时要应用的过滤器的命令。每个dict项目都由一个过滤键和一个过滤值组成。请参阅https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_DescribeInstances.html。用于可能的过滤器。过滤器名称和值区分大小写。默认情况下，将根据实例的“名称”标签，基本AMI，状态（默认为运行）和子网ID来过滤实例以进行计数。可以使用任何可查询的过滤器。良好的候选对象是特定标签，SSH密钥或安全组。
